Serato Session File Format
==========================

Field #    TAG     Description

Header
 01        vrsn     4 byte string/tag denoting version start
 02        <LENGTH> 4 byte int denoting data length
 03        <DATA>   n byte string representing the DB version

Sample Serato Session File Dump
-------------------------------

00000000  76 72 73 6e 00 00 00 3c  00 31 00 2e 00 30 00 2f  |vrsn...<.1...0./|
00000010  00 53 00 65 00 72 00 61  00 74 00 6f 00 20 00 53  |.S.e.r.a.t.o. .S|
00000020  00 63 00 72 00 61 00 74  00 63 00 68 00 20 00 4c  |.c.r.a.t.c.h. .L|
00000030  00 49 00 56 00 45 00 20  00 52 00 65 00 76 00 69  |.I.V.E. .R.e.v.i|
00000040  00 65 00 77 6f 65 6e 74  00 00 02 8f 61 64 61 74  |.e.woent....adat|
00000050  00 00 02 87 00 00 00 01  00 00 00 04 00 00 00 d4  |................|
00000060  00 00 00 02 00 00 00 ca  00 2f 00 55 00 73 00 65  |........./.U.s.e|
00000070  00 72 00 73 00 2f 00 74  00 6f 00 6d 00 62 00 65  |.r.s./.t.o.m.b.e|
00000080  00 6c 00 6c 00 2f 00 4d  00 75 00 73 00 69 00 63  |.l.l./.M.u.s.i.c|
00000090  00 2f 00 5f 00 5f 00 20  00 4e 00 65 00 77 00 20  |./._._. .N.e.w. |
000000a0  00 5f 00 5f 00 2f 00 43  00 6c 00 61 00 73 00 73  |._._./.C.l.a.s.s|
000000b0  00 69 00 63 00 20 00 48  00 6f 00 75 00 73 00 65  |.i.c. .H.o.u.s.e|
000000c0  00 20 00 53 00 75 00 6d  00 6d 00 65 00 72 00 20  |. .S.u.m.m.e.r. |
000000d0  00 27 00 31 00 38 00 2f  00 31 00 30 00 39 00 34  |.'.1.8./.1.0.9.4|
000000e0  00 37 00 33 00 36 00 30  00 5f 00 44 00 6f 00 5f  |.7.3.6.0._.D.o._|
000000f0  00 59 00 6f 00 75 00 5f  00 57 00 61 00 6e 00 6e  |.Y.o.u._.W.a.n.n|
00000100  00 61 00 5f 00 48 00 6f  00 75 00 73 00 65 00 5f  |.a._.H.o.u.s.e._|
00000110  00 4f 00 72 00 69 00 67  00 69 00 6e 00 61 00 6c  |.O.r.i.g.i.n.a.l|
00000120  00 5f 00 4d 00 69 00 78  00 2e 00 6d 00 70 00 33  |._.M.i.x...m.p.3|
00000130  00 00 00 00 00 06 00 00  00 44 00 44 00 6f 00 20  |.........D.D.o. |
00000140  00 59 00 6f 00 75 00 20  00 57 00 61 00 6e 00 6e  |.Y.o.u. .W.a.n.n|
00000150  00 61 00 20 00 48 00 6f  00 75 00 73 00 65 00 20  |.a. .H.o.u.s.e. |
00000160  00 28 00 4f 00 72 00 69  00 67 00 69 00 6e 00 61  |.(.O.r.i.g.i.n.a|
00000170  00 6c 00 20 00 4d 00 69  00 78 00 29 00 00 00 00  |.l. .M.i.x.)....|
00000180  00 07 00 00 00 36 00 44  00 4a 00 20 00 46 00 61  |.....6.D.J. .F.a|
00000190  00 76 00 6f 00 72 00 69  00 74 00 65 00 2c 00 20  |.v.o.r.i.t.e.,. |
000001a0  00 44 00 4a 00 20 00 4b  00 68 00 61 00 72 00 69  |.D.J. .K.h.a.r.i|
000001b0  00 74 00 6f 00 6e 00 6f  00 76 00 00 00 00 00 09  |.t.o.n.o.v......|
000001c0  00 00 00 0c 00 48 00 6f  00 75 00 73 00 65 00 00  |.....H.o.u.s.e..|
000001d0  00 00 00 0f 00 00 00 04  00 00 00 77 00 00 00 13  |...........w....|
000001e0  00 00 00 24 00 41 00 74  00 6c 00 61 00 6e 00 74  |...$.A.t.l.a.n.t|
000001f0  00 69 00 63 00 73 00 20  00 52 00 65 00 63 00 6f  |.i.c.s. .R.e.c.o|
00000200  00 72 00 64 00 73 00 00  00 00 00 15 00 00 00 24  |.r.d.s.........$|
00000210  00 41 00 74 00 6c 00 61  00 6e 00 74 00 69 00 63  |.A.t.l.a.n.t.i.c|
00000220  00 73 00 20 00 52 00 65  00 63 00 6f 00 72 00 64  |.s. .R.e.c.o.r.d|
00000230  00 73 00 00 00 00 00 17  00 00 00 0a 00 32 00 30  |.s...........2.0|
00000240  00 31 00 38 00 00 00 00  00 1c 00 00 00 04 5b 90  |.1.8..........[.|
00000250  3d 08 00 00 00 1d 00 00  00 04 5b 90 3d a3 00 00  |=.........[.=...|
00000260  00 1f 00 00 00 04 00 00  00 01 00 00 00 2d 00 00  |.............-..|
00000270  00 04 00 00 00 9b 00 00  00 30 00 00 00 04 00 00  |.........0......|
00000280  00 d2 00 00 00 32 00 00  00 01 01 00 00 00 33 00  |.....2........3.|
00000290  00 00 06 00 43 00 6d 00  00 00 00 00 34 00 00 00  |....C.m.....4...|
000002a0  01 01 00 00 00 35 00 00  00 04 5b 90 3d a3 00 00  |.....5....[.=...|
000002b0  00 44 00 00 00 04 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 45 00 00  |.D...........E..|
000002c0  00 04 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 46 00 00 00 01 00 00  |.........F......|
000002d0  00 00 48 00 00 00 04 00  00 00 00 6f 65 6e 74 00  |..H........oent.|
000002e0  00 02 71 61 64 61 74 00  00 02 69 00 00 00 01 00  |..qadat...i.....|
000002f0  00 00 04 00 00 00 d5 00  00 00 02 00 00 00 c0 00  |................|
00000300  2f 00 55 00 73 00 65 00  72 00 73 00 2f 00 74 00  |/.U.s.e.r.s./.t.|
00000310  6f 00 6d 00 62 00 65 00  6c 00 6c 00 2f 00 4d 00  |o.m.b.e.l.l./.M.|
00000320  75 00 73 00 69 00 63 00  2f 00 5f 00 5f 00 20 00  |u.s.i.c./._._. .|
00000330  4e 00 65 00 77 00 20 00  5f 00 5f 00 2f 00 43 00  |N.e.w. ._._./.C.|
00000340  6c 00 61 00 73 00 73 00  69 00 63 00 20 00 48 00  |l.a.s.s.i.c. .H.|
00000350  6f 00 75 00 73 00 65 00  20 00 53 00 75 00 6d 00  |o.u.s.e. .S.u.m.|
00000360  6d 00 65 00 72 00 20 00  27 00 31 00 38 00 2f 00  |m.e.r. .'.1.8./.|
00000370  31 00 30 00 39 00 34 00  37 00 33 00 36 00 32 00  |1.0.9.4.7.3.6.2.|
00000380  5f 00 4f 00 6e 00 65 00  5f 00 4d 00 6f 00 72 00  |_.O.n.e._.M.o.r.|
00000390  65 00 5f 00 54 00 65 00  61 00 6d 00 5f 00 4f 00  |e._.T.e.a.m._.O.|
000003a0  72 00 69 00 67 00 69 00  6e 00 61 00 6c 00 5f 00  |r.i.g.i.n.a.l._.|
000003b0  4d 00 69 00 78 00 2e 00  6d 00 70 00 33 00 00 00  |M.i.x...m.p.3...|
000003c0  00 00 06 00 00 00 3a 00  4f 00 6e 00 65 00 20 00  |......:.O.n.e. .|
000003d0  4d 00 6f 00 72 00 65 00  20 00 54 00 65 00 61 00  |M.o.r.e. .T.e.a.|
000003e0  6d 00 20 00 28 00 4f 00  72 00 69 00 67 00 69 00  |m. .(.O.r.i.g.i.|
000003f0  6e 00 61 00 6c 00 20 00  4d 00 69 00 78 00 29 00  |n.a.l. .M.i.x.).|
00000400  00 00 00 00 07 00 00 00  22 00 4d 00 61 00 6a 00  |........".M.a.j.|
00000410  65 00 73 00 74 00 69 00  63 00 20 00 44 00 75 00  |e.s.t.i.c. .D.u.|
00000420  62 00 63 00 61 00 74 00  7a 00 00 00 00 00 09 00  |b.c.a.t.z.......|
00000430  00 00 16 00 44 00 65 00  65 00 70 00 20 00 48 00  |....D.e.e.p. .H.|
00000440  6f 00 75 00 73 00 65 00  00 00 00 00 0f 00 00 00  |o.u.s.e.........|
00000450  04 00 00 00 7a 00 00 00  13 00 00 00 24 00 41 00  |....z.......$.A.|
00000460  74 00 6c 00 61 00 6e 00  74 00 69 00 63 00 73 00  |t.l.a.n.t.i.c.s.|
00000470  20 00 52 00 65 00 63 00  6f 00 72 00 64 00 73 00  | .R.e.c.o.r.d.s.|
00000480  00 00 00 00 15 00 00 00  24 00 41 00 74 00 6c 00  |........$.A.t.l.|
00000490  61 00 6e 00 74 00 69 00  63 00 73 00 20 00 52 00  |a.n.t.i.c.s. .R.|
000004a0  65 00 63 00 6f 00 72 00  64 00 73 00 00 00 00 00  |e.c.o.r.d.s.....|
000004b0  17 00 00 00 0a 00 32 00  30 00 31 00 38 00 00 00  |......2.0.1.8...|
000004c0  00 00 1c 00 00 00 04 5b  90 3d 27 00 00 00 1d 00  |.......[.='.....|
000004d0  00 00 04 5b 90 3d a3 00  00 00 1f 00 00 00 04 00  |...[.=..........|
000004e0  00 00 02 00 00 00 2d 00  00 00 04 00 00 00 7c 00  |......-.......|.|
000004f0  00 00 30 00 00 00 04 00  00 00 d2 00 00 00 32 00  |..0...........2.|
00000500  00 00 01 01 00 00 00 33  00 00 00 06 00 43 00 6d  |.......3.....C.m|
00000510  00 00 00 00 00 34 00 00  00 01 01 00 00 00 35 00  |.....4........5.|
00000520  00 00 04 5b 90 3d a3 00  00 00 44 00 00 00 04 00  |...[.=....D.....|
00000530  00 00 00 00 00 00 45 00  00 00 04 00 00 00 00 00  |......E.........|
00000540  00 00 46 00 00 00 01 00  00 00 00 48 00 00 00 04  |..F........H....|
00000550  00 00 00 00                                       |....|
00000554
